How careful we are with all our property. You are very careful to keep all the laws of the land, and to see that your deeds are made right. Be as careful that you get a deed [the following two lines have been over-typed and are not readable]. Those who have been careless regarding the law will 


                                    -238- 

lose heaven. We do not want to lose the place in the world that is to be purified--Abraham's farm.
